title: How to Summon Golden Freddy in Five Nights at Freddy's

steps.title: Start a night.
steps.content: Start a night. Then open the monitor and go to CAM 2B (West Hall Corner) and flip the monitor up and down until you see a poster of a close-up of Golden Freddy's face. Note that this method does not work on Android devices.

steps.title: Close the monitor when you see the poster.
steps.content: Close the monitor when you see the poster. You'll see Golden Freddy sitting in front of you.

steps.title: Flip up the monitor.
steps.content: Flip up the monitor. If you want him to kill you, just leave him there for a few seconds, but opening the monitor is the only way (besides completing a night) for him to disappear.

steps.title: Beat Night 6.
steps.content: Beat Night 6. You have now unlocked the Custom Night, go into the menu.

steps.title: Press "READY."
steps.content: Press "READY." This will cause Golden Freddy's kill screen to appear and, once again, crash/freeze your game.
